Safe Browsing.description: Google Safe Browsing is a service from Google that warns users when they attempt to navigate to a dangerous website or download dangerous files.

browser.safebrowsing.downloads.remote.en.title: Disable Google Safe Browsing for downloads
browser.safebrowsing.downloads.remote.en.description: To verify the safety of certain executable files, GeckoView may submit some information about the file, including the name, origin, size and a cryptographic hash of the contents, to the Google Safe Browsing service which helps GeckoView determine whether or not the file should be blocked.

Block Implicit Outbound.description: Control not explicitly user invoked interactions

network.http.speculative-parallel-limit.title: Disable link-mouseover opening connection to linked server

network.trr.uri.title: Use quad9 for Trusted Recursive Resolver (TRR)
network.trr.uri.description: Quad9 is a privacy-focused DNS resolver that provides malware blocking and security features.

network.trr.custom.uri.title: Use quad9 for custom Trusted Recursive Resolver (TRR)
network.trr.custom.uri.description: Quad9 is a privacy-focused DNS resolver that provides malware blocking and security features.

network.proxy.socks_remote_dns.title: Set the proxy server to do any DNS lookups when using SOCKS
network.proxy.socks_remote_dns.description: e.g. in Tor, this stops your local DNS server from knowing your Tor destination as a remote Tor node will handle the DNS request

network.file.disable_unc_paths.title: Disable using UNC (Uniform Naming Convention) paths

network.gio.supported-protocols.title: Disable GIO as a potential proxy bypass vector

security.ssl.require_safe_negotiation.title: Require safe negotiation
security.ssl.require_safe_negotiation.description: Blocks connections to servers that don't support RFC 5746 as they're potentially vulnerable to a MiTM attack.

security.tls.enable_0rtt_data.title: Disable TLS1.3 0-RTT (round-trip time)
security.tls.enable_0rtt_data.description: This data is not forward secret, as it is encrypted solely under keys derived using the offered PSK. There are no guarantees of non-replay between connections.

security.OCSP.enabled.title: Enforce OCSP fetching to confirm current validity of certificates

security.OCSP.require.title: Set OCSP fetch failures to hard-fail
security.OCSP.require.description: When a CA cannot be reached to validate a cert, GeckoView just continues the connection (=soft-fail). Setting this pref to true tells GeckoView to instead terminate the connection (=hard-fail).

security.ssl.treat_unsafe_negotiation_as.title: Display warning on the padlock for 'broken security'

browser.xul.error_pages.expert_bad_cert.title: Display advanced information on Insecure Connection warning pages

dom.security.https_first.title: Attempt to establish HTTPS connections first before falling back to HTTP

network.http.referer.XOriginPolicy.title: Only send cross-origin referer if host matches

Disallow relaxing referrer policy for cross-site requests

general.useragent.updates.enabled.title: Disable automatic User Agent updates
general.useragent.updates.enabled.description: This preference controls whether Firefox automatically updates its User-Agent string. When set to false, it prevents Firefox from automatically updating the browser's User-Agent string, which is a text identifier that tells websites which browser and version you're using.
